title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
Introducing the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set, specially designed for easy use and convenience, perfect for elderly folks who may be easily confused. This set includes a Mini Stubby Claw Hammer weighing 8 OZ and a Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer weighing 16 OZ.

The hammer head is made of high carbon steel and undergoes heat treatment for maximum durability. It features a polished finish with a rust-preventative clear coating, ensuring long-lasting performance. The handle is constructed with rubber and TPR coating, providing a soft and non-slip grip. Its ergonomic design and non-slip texture make it easy to handle and reduce vibrations. The fiberglass construction further enhances its durability and vibration absorption.

With glue feed technology, this hammer set offers excellent performance in driving and pulling nails. The narrow, flat head design allows for powerful striking, while the sharpened and curved claw provides maximum leverage for pulling nails. Its well-balanced weight and robust design make it easy to handle and operate.

For added convenience, the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set features a hang hole for easy storage. This set is suitable for all hammering and clawing tasks, making it a versatile tool for various applications.

Upgrade your toolbox with the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set. Its user-friendly features and easy handling will make all your hammering tasks a breeze.
